name: Li River Cruise from Guilin to Yangshuo
description:
Explore the must-see attraction of Guilin — the Li River. The Li River is the mother river of Guilin city. See dragon-tooth-shaped peaks, verdant bamboo forests, and tranquil, crystal waters. The narrow bamboo rafts which ply the river have been subjects for landscape painters over the centuries.

Explore the world-famous and most beautiful scenic area in China
Explore karst landforms in China
Enjoy the clear water, green hills and rare stones along Li River
A well-trained local English-speaking tour guide
An authentic traditional Chinese lunch
Hotel pickup and drop off

Key Sights: Li River，Green Hills, Bamboo Groves and Rice Paddies
